Hey! my name is:

Pablo Amadei

I am a Front-End Web Developer with solid experience in digital marketing and Entrepreneurship. Passion for web development and technology. Results-driven and motivated by learning, strong communicator at all levels, pragmatic and analytical.

Skills

  • ❯ Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML5 CSS3 (including PostCSS, SASS and BEM).
  • ❯ Proven experience using Angular 7 (Typescript) building responsive single- page applications.
  • ❯ A good understanding of using and building RESTful APIs (Node.js & Express). Working knowledge of npm, Gulp, Heroku, Netlify and version control Git.
  • ❯ Currently building MERN projects with React and Node.js and interested in learning new Programming Languages, Frameworks & libraries (i.e. Ruby, Ruby on Rails, GraphQL, tensorflow.js).
  • ❯ Working experience in Travel and Real Estate Tech industries & helping small businesses and startups.
  • ❯ Possess a Business Administration degree and experience in Entrepreneurship, Finance and Digital Marketing.
  • ❯ Languages spoken: English (fluent), Spanish (mother tongue) and French (Intermediate).

Word Experience

  • SquareFoot
  • Intvs
  • TripAdvisor

Marketing Manager

May 2019 - Sep 2019 - Squarefoot, Belfast, UK

  • Led the SEO strategy through optimization and content creation to increasing Leads and Traffic to our Real Estate Tech website. Performed Keyword and Competitor Analysis to ensure we are targeting the most beneficial Keywords and user intent.
  • Managed the product life cycle of our Wordpress site to ensure the development of new Landing Pages to increase Leads coming from Paid Social and PPC campaigns.
  • Developed Landing Pages using AMP, PHP and Wordpress.

Front End Developer

Apr 2018 - May 2019 - Intvs, Belfast, UK

  • Developed Single Page Applications with Angular 7 and NoSQL Realtime databases to retrieve data to users (MongoDB and Firebase).
  • Built a new Dashboard implementing users Authentication & role based Authorization. Users could sign up/log in and check their status pre-trip checklist. Built a second dashboard for the Customer Service team who could review users data, related documents and update the database in real time.
  • Used Node.Js (Express) to build a Restful Api and Google Cloud Functions to automate tasks and build realtime triggers. Used of third party APIs (i.e. postmark) to create a seamless UX.
  • Used CSS3 and the Material Design Components to create a responsive Web App.

Global Key Account Manager

Dec 2015 - Apr 2018 - TripAdvisor, Belfast, UK

  • Optimized partners’digital campaigns and proactively finding new ways to build the client’s business through detailed analysis and effective salesmanship.
  • Liaised with Product and Engineering team and clients to create new opportunities and improve our products.
  • Worked in collaboration with the Restaurant Team to create business opportunities and share knowledge about markets and clients.
  • Provided training to colleagues and partners to promote Mobile first through Mobile Web Optimization.
  • Actively listened to partners to generate new opportunities for the business to problem solve.
